Description: This template assigns a Service Account to a MongoDB Atlas Project with specified roles. The Service Account must already exist.

OrgId.Description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies the organization. Required for List operation.

ClientId.Description: The Client ID of the Service Account to assign to the project.

ProjectId.Description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

Roles.Description: List of project-level roles for the Service Account (comma-separated). Example: GROUP_READ_ONLY,GROUP_DATA_ACCESS_ADMIN

Profile.Description: Secret Manager Profile that contains the Atlas Programmatic keys

ClientId.Description: The Client ID of the assigned Service Account

ProjectId.Description: The Project ID where the Service Account is assigned

Roles.Description: The roles assigned to the Service Account in this project
